data.title: Beaverton School District
data.text:
We’re less than a month away from the start of the 2024-2025 school year! We hope that your family is enjoying the summer break.

Read More about Back-to-School Information 2024-25

The new Mandarin Chinese dual language program at Jacob Wismer Elementary School is now accepting applications for kindergarten students outside of the school boundary area.

Read More about Mandarin Chinese Dual Language Program at Jacob Wismer Opening to All Kindergarteners

The new Spanish dual language program at Hazeldale Elementary School is now accepting applications for kindergarten students outside of the school boundary area.

Read More about Spanish Dual Language Program at Hazeldale Opening to All Kindergarteners

BSD Superintendent Dr. Gustavo Balderas was sworn in as the 2024-2025 president of AASA, The School Superintendents Association, the nation’s premier organization representing more than 13,000 school system leaders nationwide.

Read More about BSD Superintendent Dr. Gustavo Balderas Named AASA President
